thread.title: Etihad Airways welcomes Saudi Arabian Al Ittihad Football Club to Abu Dhabi
thread.title_full: Etihad Airways welcomes Saudi Arabian Al Ittihad Football Club to Abu Dhabi

author: eTN Managing Editor
title: Etihad Airways welcomes Saudi Arabian Al Ittihad Football Club to Abu Dhabi
text:
Etihad Airways welcomes Saudi Arabian Al Ittihad Football Club to Abu Dhabi   31, 2015 eTN   
Etihad Airways has welcomed players and management staff from Al Ittihad Football Club to Abu Dhabi as they start their UAE pre-season training camp. 
Upon arrival in the capital city’s airport, players from Saudi Arabia’s oldest and most popular football club enjoyed some of the treatments and services in the airline’s arrivals lounge. 
The arrivals lounge offers premium guests a range of dining options, access to a shower, clothes press, and even a wet shave from the barber. 
The Jeddah-based team will spend the next week training as well as playing friendly matches against Baniyas Club in Dubai and Al Jazira Club in Abu Dhabi. 
Etihad Airways was announced as the official airline of Al Ittihad in July 2015.
